intro: Psychotria sechellarum, commonly known as the Seychelles psychotria, is a species of flowering plant native to the Seychelles. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its small, elliptical leaves and produces clusters of small, white to pale green flowers. It is typically found in moist, shaded habitats such as tropical rainforests. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, it is considered a rare and potentially vulnerable species.
